trans-unit.source: Provides a <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" /> implementation so that you can use the "weak event listener" pattern to attach listeners for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> or <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" /> events.
In order to be listeners in this pattern, your listener objects must implement <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>.
trans-unit.target: Per poter essere listener in questo modello, è necessario implementare gli oggetti listener <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to implement <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> on the class that is the source of the events.
trans-unit.target: Non è necessario implementare <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> nella classe che rappresenta l'origine degli eventi.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding uses this <xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager> so that internal classes that update bindings can attach listeners for a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> event on an object that is the target of a binding.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] l'associazione dati utilizza questo <xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager> in modo che le classi interne che aggiornano le associazioni possano allegare i listener per un <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> o <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento su un oggetto che rappresenta la destinazione di un'associazione.

trans-unit.source: This supports notification for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger.LostFocus> mode of data binding, without creating strong references to data binding targets.
trans-unit.target: Supporta la notifica per il <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger.LostFocus> modalità di associazione di dati, senza creare sicuro fa riferimento alle destinazioni di associazione dati.

trans-unit.source: The source object that the raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> or <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" /> event.
The delegate that handles the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> or <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" /> event.

Adds the specified event handler, which is called when specified source raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> or <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" /> event.

Use this method to specify the event handler you want to use to subscribe to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> event..
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per specificare il gestore dell'evento che si desidera utilizzare per sottoscrivere il <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> o <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento...

trans-unit.source: When you use this method, your listener object does not need to implement the <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> interface.
trans-unit.target: Quando si utilizza questo metodo, l'oggetto listener non deve implementare l'interfaccia <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The object with the event.
The object to add as a listener.
Adds the provided listener to the list of listeners on the provided source.
Returns a new object to contain listeners to the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> or <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" /> event.
A new object to contain listeners to the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> or <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" /> event.
The source object that the raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> or <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" /> event.
The delegate that handles the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> or <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" /> event.
Removes the specified event handler from the specified source.
<paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The object to remove the listener from.
The listener to remove.
Removes the specified listener from the list of listeners on the provided source.
The object on which to start listening for the pertinent <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> event.
Begins listening for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> event on the given source, attaching an internal class handler to that source.

The provided source is checked for type to see if it is <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> , and then adds the class handler for the appropriate event to that source.
trans-unit.target: Viene verificata l'origine specificata per il tipo verificare se è <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> o <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> , e quindi aggiunge il gestore della classe per l'evento appropriato a tale origine.

trans-unit.source: The source object on which to stop listening for <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" />.
Stops listening for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus" /> event on the given source.
